UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile and account information in the E&F WorkBee application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

name.description: The full name of the user.

accountType.description: The type of user account: 'Worker' or 'Customer'.

photoUrl.description: URL to the user's profile photo.

isAvailable.description: Whether the worker is currently available for jobs.

skills.description: List of skills or service categories the user provides.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the profile was created.

Job.title: Job
Job.description: Represents a job posting in the system.

description.description: A detailed description of the job.

customerId.description: The UID of the user who posted the job.

selectedApplicantId.description: The UID of the worker selected for the job.

selectedApplicantName.description: The name of the worker selected for the job.

status.description: The current status of the job.

JobApplication.title: JobApplication
JobApplication.description: Represents an application to a job posting.

applicantId.description: The UID of the user who applied.

applicantName.description: The name of the applicant at the time of application.

ChatRoom.title: ChatRoom
ChatRoom.description: A communication channel between a customer and a selected worker for a job.

jobId.description: The ID of the job this chat is linked to.

participants.description: List of user UIDs participating in the chat.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: A single message within a chat room.

senderId.description: UID of the user who sent the message.

/jobs/{jobId}/applications/{applicationI.description: Stores applications for a specific job.

/chatRooms/{jobId}.description: Stores chat room metadata. The roomId matches the jobId.

/chatRooms/{jobId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores messages for a specific chat room.
